release.summary: This is a significant overhaul of much of the infrastructure which will build the foundation for a much more versatile app. Rawdroid Demo and Rawdroid Pro are now separate apps, if you are a Pro user please uninstall the Demo and upgrade Pro.
release.change: Added: Metadata database. Faster lookups and will allow for filtering/searching in the future.
Added: Native watermarking. Watermarking is completely custom now with reduced memory overhead and significant speed improvements.
Added: Native JPEG read/write. Working around Android's implementation reduces memory and greatly improves speed.
Added: Full raw decode. The code is in place but disabled while I work on speed. It was holding up this build for too long.
Added: TIFF read support. You can now read TIFF images; write support in the future.
Improved: Massive speed boost, many users can expect 50-100% improved load times.
